LanguageData.SadjuukExtractorA.label: Silicon Extractor
LanguageData.SadjuukExtractorA.description: HP : 450 Power : 600W A very complex machinery capable of extracting silicon from the rock. Produce construction components like glass and concrete from stone.
LanguageData.SadjuukExtractorUpgradeA.label: Mineral Heater
LanguageData.SadjuukExtractorUpgradeA.description: HP : 150 Power : 450W Speed : +15% Extractor Upgrade : Improve the speed of the Silicon Extractor by heating mineral residues in a very high temperature air circuit.
